title: The Week of Judy Foster: Counselor of Courage

story.text: Judy Foster, a retired teacher and counselor, discovers she has the ability to absorb and alleviate the emotional pain of others while at a local community meeting.
Using her newfound powers, Judy visits a school to help troubled teenagers find peace, offering them guidance and soaking up their anxieties, leaving them calm and focused.
Judy helps resolve a heated dispute in her neighborhood by calming the angry parties and encouraging a peaceful dialogue. News of her abilities starts to spread.
At a busy local hospital, Judy spends the day easing the emotional burdens of overwhelmed medical staff and anxious patients, energizing the entire building.
The mayor calls upon Judy to assist in a city-wide mediation event, which she coordinates and uses her powers to facilitate understanding among community leaders.
Judy leads a workshop on emotional resilience, combining her counseling skills with her powers to great effect, inspiring participants to face their challenges bravely.
Exhausted yet fulfilled, Judy spends a quiet day at home, reflecting on her impactful week, and realizing her true potential as a healer in her community.

ending: And so, Judy learned that true heroism comes not from the powers one has, but from the lives one touches.
moral: No matter the age, anyone can make a significant impact in their community with compassion and determination.
